channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Japan Data Confirms First Currency Intervention Since 2022
item.description: Japan spent $62.42 billion on currency intervention between April 26 and May 29, Finance Ministry data showed Friday.

item.title: Gap's Look Is Finally Back on Point
item.description: The apparel retailer’s new leadership is bringing excitement back to all of its brands without sacrificing profitability.

item.title: OPEC leaves forecast for demand-growth unchanged
Own a 401(k)? You Could Soon Vote on Issues Like Elon Musk's Pay
item.description: “Pass-through voting” is on the rise this proxy season, thanks to new fintech tools. It is perfectly suited for an era in which ESG and “anti-ESG” mov...

item.title: Monster Beverage’s stock up 1.4% after company announces Dutch auction tender offer for up to $3 billion of its own stock
Bill Ackman Eyes IPO of Pershing Square
item.description: Bill Ackman is planning to take his investment firm public as soon as next year, the boldest move yet by the hedge-fund manager to capitalize on his s...

item.title: Cigna’s stock jumps 2.7% after earnings beat estimates and company raises guidance
American Express Zooms Ahead as Gen Z Gets Hooked on Card Rewards
item.description: Amex has found that young spenders enjoy perks as much or more than their parents. Now it has to keep them happy.

item.title: Dropbox says cybersecurity incident is unlikely to have a material impact on operations
